Bosses.Name: Chudo-Yudo
Bosses.Strategy: At some point during the fight Chudo-yudo will move to a random point in the arena and start casting Swinge, all players must get behind the boss to avoid being hit with several debuffs.

KeyMechanics.Name: Rake
KeyMechanics.Description: Rake is an instant attack that will deal a small ammount of damage to the tank.

KeyMechanics.Name: Lion's Breath
KeyMechanics.Description: A casted breath attack that will hit any player infront of the boss and inflict them with the Burns debuff.

KeyMechanics.Name: Swinge
KeyMechanics.Description: Frontal AOE that will inflice the Silence and Pacification debuff for 5 seconds to any player hit.

Bosses.Name: Koshchei
Bosses.Strategy: There are three cannons located on the far end of the boss arena, throughout the fight Koshchei will spawn dragon adds in front of the cannons and you must use the cannons with adds infront of them to kill them.
Bosses.TLDR: Use the cannons with adds infront of them to kill the adds.

KeyMechanics.Name: Collapse
KeyMechanics.Description: Instant cast ability that will hit all players infront of the boss

KeyMechanics.Name: Spiked Tail
KeyMechanics.Description: Spiked Tail will inflict the Poison debuff on whoever it hits.

KeyMechanics.Name: Typhoon
KeyMechanics.Description: Typhoon will spawn a tornado in the area that will slowly follow a player arround, anyone hit by the tornado will take some damage and be inflicted with the Windburn debuff.

KeyMechanics.Name: Blazing Trail
KeyMechanics.Description: A frontal cone AOE that will deal high damage to anyone hit.

Bosses.Name: Isgebind
Bosses.Strategy: Throughout the fight Isgebind will fly up and half the arena will be taken up by a ice blue AOE indicator dealing high damage and inflicting the Frostbite debuff to anyone caught in it after a few seconds after this the boss will use Touchdown and land on the tank dealing damage to the tank and anyone arround them
Bosses.TLDR: Isgebind will periodically fly into the air and cast line AOEs across the arena dealing damage and inflicting debuffs, after this he will then land on the tank.

KeyMechanics.Name: Rime Wreath
KeyMechanics.Description: A raid wide damage attack that will hit all players for moderate damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Frost Breath
KeyMechanics.Description: Frost breath is a frontal AOE that will hit all players inside for high damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Sheet of ice
KeyMechanics.Description: Isgebind will target a random player and use sheet of ice when this ability hits the player it will inflictthe Paralysis debuff and leave behind and patch of ice that will deal damage and the Fostbite debuff to anyone who walks in
